entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
